Translations.Text: When the heaven developed cracks
And it gave ear (i.e., listened) to its Nourisher-Sustainer, and (thus) it was proved true (to Allah’s Command)
And when the earth was expanded enough
and it cast out what (had been) therein, and became empty
And it gave ear to its Nourisher-Sustainer, and (thus) it was proved true
O you the human being! Surely, you are (the) one striving towards your Nourisher-Sustainer — a hard effort, then (you are the one) who must meet Him
Then as for him who is given his record from his right (side)
then soon he is put to Accountability — a very easy reckoning
And he returns to his followers in joy
And as for him who is given his record from behind his back
so soon he will seek destruction (so that he may become destroyed rather than stay in a lasting punishment)
And he shall enter the blazing Fire
Verily, he was among his family fully involved in joy and amusement
Verily, he thought that he will never return (to Allah)
Yes! Verily, his Nourisher-Sustainer remained a Strict Watch over him (throughout his worldly span of life)
So beware! I bring to witness the heaven in evening twilight
and (I bring to witness) the night and whatever it enveloped and hid
and (I bring to witness) the moon when it became fully felt and known (i.e., it revealed its secrets to man)
Without doubt you would surely embark (for journey) from one field to another field (of influence of a heavenly body)
So what (is the matter) with them that they Believe not
And when is recited unto them Al-Quran they do not submit
Nay, (on the contrary) those who have disbelieved, they belie (the contents of the Book)
And Allah knows better what they amass
So announce to them ‘the good news’ about a painful torment —
save those who have Believed and performed righteous deeds — for them is a reward, not stopped or interrupted
The heaven, possessor of Buruj, acts as a witness
and the Promised Day
and one who witnesses, and what has been witnessed
Stand condemned the people (who acted as perpetrators) of the sites of the ditches and trenches
(They arranged) the fire fed with abundant fuel (of alive Believers who refused to submit to illegitimate gods)
When those (perpetrators), alongside that (are) in sitting position (as executioners and spectators)
And they, over what they do with the Believers, are witnesses
And they did not take revenge from them except (for the reason) that they will continue to Believe in Allah, the All-Mighty, Worthy of Praise
That One: for Him is the Dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is Witness over all things

Verily, those who had put into torture the Believing males and the Believing females, and then did not turn in repentance — then for them is the punishment of Hell, and for them is the punishment of Al-Hariq (the blazing-Fire of Hell)
Verily, those who accepted Faith and performed righteous deeds: for them are Gardens, flow from underneath them rivers. That (becomes) the supreme success
Verily, the Grip (of retribution) of your Nourisher-Sustainer is indeed very, very strict
Surely He, He initiates (a creation) and shall (afterwards) resurrect
And He is the Oft-Forgiving, the Most Loving One
Owner of the Throne, the Glorious
Fully Capable of doing what He intends
Has (the) Hadees of the forces reached you —
(the forces) of Firaun and Samud
Nay! Those who have disbelieved (persist) in (the) denial
And Allah, from beyond their limits is All-Surveillant (over them)
Of course! That is a Glorious Quran
(inscribed) in Al-Lawh-al-Mahfuz (the Preserved Tablet)
The heaven and At-Tariq ('The strictly adhering to a set path') act as a witness (to Allah’s Majesty)
And what made you realise what At-Tariq is
(It is) a star of piercing brightness
There is no (human) Nafs but over her is a protector
So let the human being ponder from what he has been created
He is created from a fluid ejecting itself swiftly
it proceeds from between back-bones and the ribs (since it is here where the source initially resides)
Surely, He is All-Capable over his revival (on the Day of Resurrection)
the Day when the secrets are subjected to Accountability
Then there is not for him from any (power) and nor (any one) out of that who helps
The heaven possessing reemergence [of clouds and rains (is a witness, of the Majesty of its Creator]
and the earth, possessor of the action of splitting-up
Verily, this (Al-Kitab is) indeed a Qawlun Faslun
And it is not a senseless statement
Surely, they (i.e., the hypocrites and the disbelievers) plot a stratagem (against the propagation of Al-Kitab)
And I (also) plan a stratagem
So give (some) respite to the disbelievers. Provide them a temporary respite
